summary: UI/UX improvements to authentication and layout: remove login warmup delay, adjust card/container spacing to prevent text cutoff/overflow, and move account actions into a hamburger menu in the header.

existing_features.title: Adjust the identity confirmation card so its content is never cut off: make the card height fully auto (no implicit/explicit fixed height constraints), reduce internal padding slightly where needed, and ensure long text (e.g., principal) wraps without overflowing.
Reduce the padding of the parent container that wraps the affected card to eliminate overflow, with a significant reduction primarily on top/bottom while preserving reasonable left/right padding.

Replace the header’s direct Logout and Delete Account buttons with a small hamburger menu in AuthenticatedHeader that contains actions for Logout and Delete Account; keep the existing delete confirmation dialog and preserve current disabled/loading/error behavior for both actions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make Internet Identity authentication open instantly with zero warmup (no backend warmup call, no delay before popup).
Fix layout issues: increase card height (use auto-height) and reduce card padding so text isn’t cut off.
Significantly reduce the parent container padding (mainly top/bottom) to prevent overflow.
Add a hamburger navigation menu in the header containing Logout and Delete Account options instead of showing them directly in the header.

projectName: Fix auth card layout overflow and move account actions into a hamburger menu
